name: Escape from Ivy & Piper
description:
Immediately following the events of Strip n Play with Valerie
you begin a race against the clock to Escape from Ivy and Piper​

Valerie has fallen in love with you, and Ivy is determined to discover how you have achieved something she believed to be impossible. Can you make sure Val's love for you stays strong?
Can the two of you escape before it's too late?

Ivy is your captor. She will interrogate you and try to persuade
you to reveal the truth behind your control over Val. She needs to find a way to remove your power and save her pupil. Can you discover the secret of Val's love first to protect what you have? Can you endure Ivy's interrogations and keep your cool, or will she seduce and persuade you to shift your loyalty?

Piper wants to use you as her personal play-thing. She is not going to pass up an opportunity to be with a man that can finally satisfy her. Will she use you up before you get a chance to escape, or can you convince her to let you go? Will you succumb to her advances or can you maintain your focus? Do you have the wits to sneak around, the stamina to keep her satisfied, and the charm to win her over?

Mia is Ivy's newest pupil. But given the circumstances, she feels neglected of her training. Can you use this to your advantage?

Also meet a whole new set of sexy women from the catalog! They might not be the main characters of the game, but they will each make a big impact and leave you wanting for more!


You will have 30 days to escape with your life. But if you play your cards right, maybe you can escape with someone else, or better yet, turn the tables and turn your prison into your own personal heavenly harem of sexy succubi!





The is a visual novel game built with a small "escape room" game mechanic. The majority of the game will be story driven where choices matter, and heavy on sexual interactions. This game is built with ren'py and has a traditional VN feel. There are 3 main girls in the game to have relationships with. Val, Ivy, and Piper all have different motivations for their actions and there for require different ways of handling their relationships. On the surface, the goal is to escape the house and to not die at the hands of the succubus, but let's be real, the actual goal is to seduce them and end up with all 3 of them at your command. The goal of the game play is to make it easy to run through the game while pursuing 1 of the girls, a little more difficult to juggle 2 of them, and really hard to end up with with all 3 of them! But The reward for seducing all 3 will be amazing!

Are you ready to play?
